title: New: Only Real – Backseat Kissers
content:
One of the fastest rising talents in the UK, London youngster Only Real is a welcome antidote to all those yearning the ironic socio-political commentary of Jamie T.

Gritty, raw and admirably true to its roots, Backseat Kissers showcases a more soulful side to the young troubadour, yet with the same drug-induced lethargy found on previous tracks. Still very early days, Only Real is fine example of talent rising above PR ploys and marketing gimmicks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
